participant_1.background: i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.

participant_2.background: i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. i am also a graduate student. my parents taught me survival skills.

content.text: Hi! My name is Avid. What do you do in this competition?
